EnergyAttrCertPurchase.name: EnergyAttrCertPurchase
EnergyAttrCertPurchase.description: Represents information about the purchase of energy attribute certificates from the clean energy project supplier. The information includes terms of engagement and the delivery type of energy attribute certificate.

CertifiedBy.description: The name of the organization that certified the clean energy project at the time of purchase.

CleanEnergyProjectId.description: The clean energy project associated with the energy attribute certificate purchase.

Description.description: The description of the energy attribute certificate purchase.

EndDate.description: The end date of the engagement with the power supplier.

ExpectedAnnualPowerGnrn.description: The expected annual power generation measured in megawatts (MW).

InvoiceNumber.description: The invoice number associated with the energy attribute certificate purchase.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the energy attribute certificate purchase record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PlannedAnnualPowerGnrn.description: The planned annual power generation measured in megawatt hour (MWh).

ProjRegistryIdentifier.description: The unique identifier that's assigned by the registry to the clean energy project.

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: The purchase order number associated with the energy attribute certificate purchase.

PurchaseType.description: Specifies the type of purchase or agreement with the supplier of energy attribute certificate credits.

StartDate.description: The start date of the engagement with the power supplier.

TotEnrgyAttrCrAllocMwh.description: The total energy attribute credits allocated for the energy attribute certificate purchase measured in megawatt hour (MWh).

TotEnrgyAttrCrAvlMwh.description: The total energy attribute credits available for the energy attribute certificate purchase measured in megawatt hour (MWh).

TotEnrgyAttrCrPurchMwh.description: The total energy attribute credits purchased for the energy attribute certificate purchase measured in megawatt hour (MWh).

TotalSpend.description: The total spend for the energy attribute certificate purchase.

TradeLocation.description: The hub and delivery location where the electricity products are traded.
